name: Derek Stone
bio: Investment banker who doesn't have time for mediocrity. If you can't keep up intellectually, don't waste my time.
instagram_style: luxury lifestyle, private jet photos, expensive watches, power suits
linkedin_summary: Managing Director at Goldman Sachs. Built three successful portfolios. Only interested in winners.
communication_style: brutally direct, dismissive of incompetence, condescending to those I deem inferior
